newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - University of Alabama.
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - University of Alabama.

text.p: The Board of Trustees of the University of Alabama

The Board of Trustees of the University of Alabama (the Board'') will receive sealed bids for the purchase from it of the bonds referred to above (the offices of Sterne, Agee & Leach, Inc., Suite 2100

AmSouth/Harbert Plaza, 1901 6th Avenue North, Birmingham, Alabama 35203, up to the hour of 11:00 a.m., Central Time, on such date as may be established by the undersigned Vice President for Financial Affairs of the University of Alabama and communicated through Munifacts News Service (and as otherwise provided in the Official Invitation for Bids) not less than twenty-four (24) hours prior to the time the bids are to be received.

The Bonds will be issued as fully registered bonds in the denomination of $5,000 or any integral multiple thereof and will mature in the following aggregate principal amounts on June 1 in the following years:
Year ofPrincipal*Year ofPrincipal* Year of Principal

Interest on the Bonds (computed on the basis of a 360-day year of twelve consecutive 30-day months) will be payable semiannually on each June 1 and December 1, beginning December 1, 1997. The principal of the Bonds will be payable at the principal office of Compass Bank, Birmingham,

Alabama, in its capacity as trustee (the Trustee'') under a General Fee Revenue Trust Indenture dated as of April 1, 1987. Interest on the Bonds will be payable by check or draft mailed by the Trustee to the registered holders of the Bonds at the addresses shown on the registry books of the Trustee pertaining to the Bonds.
Each bid must be on the Official Bid Form and conform to the terms and conditions set forth in the Official

This announcement does not constitute the solicitation of bids to purchase the Bonds. The sale of the Bonds shall be made exclusively pursuant to the terms of the Official Invitation for Bids. Copies of the Official Invitation for Bids, the Official Bid Form and the Preliminary Official Statement will be furnished upon request made to the Board's Financial Advisor, Sterne, Agee & Leach, Inc., P.O. Box 750
*Subject to change, as provided in the Official Invitation for Bids.
** Subject to special term bond option, as provided in the Official Invitation for Bids.
